comment: Dr. Q is so sweet! I enjoyed this new workshop-based class. I've taken her before and liked her. The class involves group work, peer review, tech-heavy assignments, and chances for revisions. If you're interested in diverse communities, especially disability, you'll learn a lot. If you attend class, do the readings, and keep up, you will succeed.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Online Savvy

comment: Dr. Q's Accessible Writing class (special topic ENGL 4490) brought my skills up to a whole new level. Fascinating assignments (though lots of work)! Many of the assignments, such as a cover letter and a portfolio, will be helpful when job hunting. She is very encouraging, flexible. and approachable. The course material was very well organized.

Dr. Quirici is a great professor who places great emphasis on interpreting British Literature. The majority of assignments were discussion boards in the "keyword - quote - question" format in order to guide the discussion and our thinking. For the midterm and final papers, she allows you to choose from several options to best suit your interests.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Q provided fun assignments with actually interesting texts. Instead of plain paragraphs, discussion is used to talk about course texts. A lot of creativity is allowed for your big assignments. Besides being a fairly lenient class, it was also the most fun I had this semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Gives good feedback

comment: there is a new topic that is focused on every week. so every week she assigns different readings. there was about three longer books that we read over 2 or 3 weeks. at the end of the week you complete a discussion post. there are a few quizzes, a midterm project, and a final paper. she is the sweetest!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: This was an ENGL 2174 class and it was a lot of discussion posts. We had a midterm project and a final paper. The final required peer review groups which was helpful. She gives good feedback and is very helpful even outside of class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Fully online class, with lots of books to read. Definitely keep up with reading or make sure there is sparknotes for the information you need. The books were interesting and assignments changed so you weren't doing the same thing over and over. Usually a discussion post and a few quizzes. Very nice lady when I emailed her.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Any english class past 1102 requires effort so take time out of your week to read. The actual material was not too difficult and the class mostly consisted of weekly discussions and the occasional quiz. Professor Q. was not only a great person but also a great professor. She is very caring and clearly wants everyone to succeed. Take her!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--Accessible outside class
